sentences.en: Be sure to ventilate on the upstroke.
sentences.cn: 要明确吹气是在手抬起时吹入的.

sentences.en: Both patients are sedated and ventilated.
sentences.cn: 两位病人都用了镇静剂和呼吸机。

sentences.en: Features: imitation leather do not ventilate the heat well!
sentences.cn: 特点: 仿皮做的是不透风保暖的效果很好!

sentences.en: He did not think it the job of officials to ventilate their doubts or daydreams.
sentences.cn: 他认为公开提出自己的疑问或不切实际的想法并非官员们的分内之事。

sentences.en: I usually ventilate my house after a night of smoking cigars.
sentences.cn: 在抽完一晚雪茄之后我通常会给我的房子通通风.

sentences.en: It certainly remains for the press a virtue to ventilate opinion.
sentences.cn: 发表意见当然仍是媒体的职责.

sentences.en: Members are asked not to ventilate club problems outside this meeting.
sentences.cn: 要求会员们在这次会议之外勿公开讨论本俱乐部的问题.

sentences.en: Protect tummy button from catching cold. Absorbent, ventilate.
sentences.cn: 保护肚脐以免受凉,吸汗 、 透气.

sentences.en: She began to ventilate her opinion angrily.
sentences.cn: 她开始生气地发表自己的看法.

sentences.en: Strengthen blood vessel's ventilate ability, make eyes bright and spiritual.
sentences.cn: 增强血管的通透性,令眼部血气充足, 亮目怡神.

sentences.en: The finished goods have the features: delicate and ventilate and comfortable.
sentences.cn: 罩杯产品具备外形美观,透气舒适的特点.
肺吸收新鲜空气使血液净化.

sentences.en: They should ventilate the galleries of a coal - mine.
sentences.cn: 他们应该使煤矿坑道通风.

sentences.en: To expose to free movement of air; ventilate or dry.
sentences.cn: 为了使变干而暴露在 温和 的或热的空气中.

sentences.en: Ventilate the room properly when paint stripping.
sentences.cn: 当油漆开始剥落时，要给房间适当通风。

sentences.en: Ventilate the room properly when stripping paint.
sentences.cn: 在刮漆的时候要适当地使房间通风。

sentences.en: We ventilate a room by opening windows.
sentences.cn: 我们开窗以使室内空气流通.

words.tran_cn: 发表；使…通风（ventilate的过去分词）
放出；（通过排泄等）减轻压力

trans.tran_en: to let fresh air into a room, building etc

trans.tran_cn: 使通风，通风，公开，公开讨论
trans.tran_en: to let fresh air into a room, building etc
